titleStmt.title: To the Kings most excellent Maiestie
titleStmt.author: Dee, John, 1527-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Short, dwelling on Bred-streete hill neere to the end of old Fish-streete, at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: In left margin: The true copie of M. Iohn Dee his petition to the kings most excellent Maiestie, exhibited: anno 1604. Iunij 5. at Greenwich.
Requesting that he be cleared of slanders that he is a conjurer of devils.
Imprint from colophon of "A letter, nine yeeres since, written and first published" (STC 6461), of which this forms quire chi.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Bred-streete hill neere to the end of old Fish-streete, at the signe of the Starre
